title: ping issue... pbe ping is HALF my normal client ping?
body:
i have a ping spiking issues but that isnt going to go away as far as i can tell...

but... when i logged into PBE
i get 33 MS ping... (when it doesn't spike to 400)
and when i log onto normal client i get 66 ping (when it doesn't spike to 400)

i mean aren't the NA servers in the same location as the PBE server? Thier both in Irvine CA.. RIGHT?

shouldnt my ping rfrom Sf bay area CA be the same to both servers?

replies.body:
still wondering if any of this can be helped... honestly i would rather have the higher ping issue fixed but i don't believe that is something i cant change without router access and it may be comcast not us..

i am still curious as to why the pbe ping is HALF my normal ping though... that shouldn't have anything to do with my router setting...

lol i have done all that a thousand times.. but if it will make you feel better about your answer sure XD.
its not like i can change any settings on my router anyways. i unfortunately had to move back to my parents house.

and my dad is a networking guy at HP.. so yeah he has all enterprise grade stuff in the house and despite all the things i know how to do (most fo which i learned from him)

http://imgur.com/a/WGON2


unfortunately i cannot connect to a wired network because the cable form upstairs to do was cut and isn't going to be re-added. but my room is directly above the router and its wireless AC

i mean if you could fix the ping spikes every 30 seconds-5 min from spiking to 200-400 that would be great... (better infact that figuring out why my pbe account has lower ping)

but since i doubt we can do that without access to the router. i am just curoius to know why PBE has half the ping of main account..

(and yes i am using my sister's pbe account because she quit league two years ago and i have been trying to get into pbe for three years to no avail so i finally asked her if i can use hers and it still works...)

Hmmmm you should be getting about the same ping on normal and PBE servers, but it doesn't mean that you'll always have the same ping. Let's check out some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick just in case, and hit me back if that doesn't help at all.
